Title: Alive and Kicking
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Michelle Paradise, Michael Narducci, L.J. Smith (character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries"), Marguerite MacIntyre (story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (executive story editor)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Davina's secret is exposed; Elijah makes a suggestion to Klaus; Esther moves on with her plan; Hayley meets with her pack. (#24)
